attributes.action: close the borders and create a census
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we are all aware of the growin population of polish and said foreigners to the country at this moment, the borders should be closed and a complete census of the entire country should follow, find out each household's nationality and occupation, how much money they bring in, in a typical year, and what they spend the majority of that money on, a lot of say like the polish earn their money over here then send a lot of that money back home hence not putting the money back into our economy, n our prices go up to compensate that fact then. a lot of these foreigners also take priority over newly refurbished houses too, and a lot of them do not work, if they do come over here they should find a job withing say 5-six month or face deportation, or at least some form of disaplinary action, noone lives for free and why should they come over here and be drawing off the state? its money they did not put to.
